title: 关于playerpoints和cc菜单的问题
txt_content:
我只要一在cc菜单中显示“我的点券{points}”，（这个变量是playerponits的变量）菜单就无法打开，然后服务端输出这样一段报错：
[10:05:07 ERROR]: Could not pass event PlayerInteractEvent to ChestCommands v3.1.4
org.bukkit.event.EventException
        at org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPluginLoader$1.execute(JavaPluginLoader.java:338) ~[JavaPluginLoader$1.class:1.7.10-R0.1-SNAPSHOT]
        at org.bukkit.plugin.RegisteredListener.callEvent(RegisteredListener.java:62) ~[RegisteredListener.class:1.7.10-R0.1-SNAPSHOT]
        at org.bukkit.plugin.SimplePluginManager.fireEvent(SimplePluginManager.java:507) [SimplePluginManager.class:1.7.10-R0.1-SNAPSHOT]
        at org.bukkit.plugin.SimplePluginManager.callEvent(SimplePluginManager.java:492) [SimplePluginManager.class:1.7.10-R0.1-SNAPSHOT]

        at net.minecraft.network.NetHandlerPlayServer.func_147346_a(NetHandlerPlayServer.java:821) [nh.class:?]

        at net.minecraft.network.play.client.C08PacketPlayerBlockPlacement.func_148833_a(SourceFile:9) [jo.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.network.NetworkManager.func_74428_b(NetworkManager.java:245) [ej.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.network.NetworkSystem.func_151269_c(NetworkSystem.java:173) [nc.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71190_q(MinecraftServer.java:991) [MinecraftServer.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.func_71190_q(DedicatedServer.java:431) [lt.class:?]

        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_231]
Caused by: java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: org.black_ixx.playerpoints.PlayerPointsAPI.look(Ljava/util/UUID;)I
        at com.gmail.filoghost.chestcommands.bridge.PlayerPointsBridge.getPoints(PlayerPointsBridge.java:32) ~[?:?]
        at com.gmail.filoghost.chestcommands.internal.Variable$5.getReplacement(Variable.java:42) ~[?:?]
        at com.gmail.filoghost.chestcommands.api.Icon.calculateLore(Icon.java:251) ~[?:?]

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
更新下 playerpoints 试试，看上去是过旧，找不到一个方法。




PlayerPoints.jar
(101.09 KB, 下载次数: 6)



2019-12-9 10:51 上传
点击文件名下载附件

replies.author: qq4186078
replies.txt_content:
去下载个PlaceholderAPI
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php? ... B61%5D%5Btype%5D%3D  

然后用这个变量 %playerpoints_points%
